mapper.select: SELECT board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick FROM (SELECT rownum n, board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, member_num, member_nick FROM (SELECT board_num, title, content, bdate, views, board_type_num, MEMBER.member_num, member_nick FROM board, member WHERE member.member_num = #{member_num} AND board.member_num = MEMBER.member_num ORDER BY board_num DESC)) WHERE n BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
select count(*) from board where member_num = #{member_num}
